## Installation

| Installation Method | Command |
| --- | --- |
| Via [uv](https://github.com/astral-sh/uv) | `uv add dbrownell_ToolsDirectory` |
| Via [pip](https://pip.pypa.io/en/stable/) | `pip install dbrownell_ToolsDirectory` |
